content:
/>
IX.iii.1.l.6.
e
.
VA Burial Benefits
Do not count VA burial benefits.
Note
:  If a beneficiary claims a final expense deduction and subsequently receives VA burial benefits as reimbursement for paying those same expenses, adjust the award.
Reference
:  For more information on VA burial expenses, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.K.1.c
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
